changeSet.author: CI OpenELIS developers group
changeSet.sql: COMMENT ON COLUMN clinlims.type_of_sample.display_key IS 'Resource file lookup key for localization of displaying the name';

changeSet.author: CI OpenELIS developers group

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from clinlims.qa_event where display_key = 'qa_event.Sample_LA';

changeSet.author: CI OpenELIS developers group

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from clinlims.type_of_sample where display_key = 'Sample.type.Plasma';

changeSet.author: CI OpenELIS developers group
